resources.string: Saur Urja Vehicle Challenge (SUVC) is an attempt to endorse renewable sources of energy for nourishing our planet back to its glory. It is a National-level solar and electric car racing event organized by government registered Refrangible Society (RSTE). You can support us and win exciting rewards by participating in this challenge as a team of a maximum of 40 members for a 5-day event using a self-designed and self-developed vehicle as per the rulebook provided by SUVC.
